tool.name: Fimo Gff to Gff
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
This tool requires 1-based input data, 0-based data will produce incorrect results.
.. class:: warningmark
This tool requires FASTA headers that use the default bedtools getfasta header format of **chrom:start-stop(strand)** or **chrom:start-stop** in which case strand is set as '+' per the bedtools standard.
**What it does**
Converts FIMO tabular (almost GFF) files to true genomic coordinates in valid GFF format. A collection of datasets is produced consisting of one dataset per motif discovered in the input.
